faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Need help with something? Here are some of the most common questions we get.

items.question: Is there a free trial available?
items.answer: Yes. Start a free trial to access trend briefs, sample forecasts, and AI insights. Explore the platform without commitment and see the impact on demand prediction and assortment decisions.

items.question: How do teams access forecasts and reports?
items.answer: Browse categories, choose your markets, and open on‑demand forecasts and deep‑dive reports. You can filter by season, category, price band, and export insights for your workflows.

items.question: Can we customize outputs to our taxonomy?
items.answer: Yes. Align categories, attributes, and KPIs to your internal taxonomy. Map sizes, colors, price tiers, and hierarchy levels for consistent planning and reporting.

items.question: How is my data protected on the platform?
items.answer: We use encryption in transit and at rest, scoped access controls, and audited infrastructure. Enterprise options include data residency and SSO (SAML/OIDC).

newsletter.title: Stay Ahead with Fashion Trend Forecasts
newsletter.description: Join a community of merchandisers, designers, and buyers. Get demand‑sensed trend briefs, forecasting insights, and assortment best practices delivered to your inbox.

productFeed.title: Product Feed
productFeed.description: Manage and optimize your product feeds for better market reach
productFeed.metaDescription: Manage and optimize your product feeds for better market reach

manage.title: Create / Edit Repricing Rule
manage.subtitle: Use this page to create or edit your pricing rule

step1.title: Step 1 - Rule name
step1.subtitle: Please enter a recognizable name for this rule

step2.title: Step 2 - Repricing
step2.subtitle: Select what actions we must perform on your prices
step2.example: Example: Your product costs € {current}, competitor price is € {competitor}, new price will be € {new}

step3.title: Step 3 - Select Competitors
step3.subtitle: Choose which competitors to track for this rule
step3.noCompetitors: No competitors available. Add one to get started.

step4.title: Step 4 - Stop Condition
step4.subtitle: Choose when this rule must be halted
step4.enableSection: Please select Min / Max / Min-Max as stop condition to enable this section

manual.title: Manually Assign
manual.description: Manually specify your Min/Max prices for all items assigned this repricing rule via products page or using the bulk upload option in the import page

grossMargin.title: Markup
grossMargin.description: Automatically specify your Min/Max prices for all items assigned this repricing rule using a Markup fixed or percentage value based on your product Cost

cost.title: Item Cost
cost.description: Automatically specify your Min/Max prices for all items assigned this repricing rule based on percentage of the individual cost of the item

price.title: Item Price
price.description: Automatically specify your Min/Max prices for all items assigned this repricing rule based on percentage of the individual price of the item

map.title: MAP
map.description: Automatically specify your Min/Max prices for all items assigned this repricing rule based on the MAP you assigned to your product

step5.title: Step 5 - Apply to products
step5.subtitle: Select which product(s) must be considered or excluded

step7.title: Step 7 - Repricing Method
step7.subtitle: Choose if Pricefy will apply the new price automatically on your platform or will just suggest it

semiAutomatic.title: Semi-Automatic
semiAutomatic.description: Pricefy will suggest you the new price which you could apply with just a click.

autopilot.title: Autopilot
autopilot.description: Price will be automatically changed by Pricefy, every day, according to this rule.
autopilot.afterImport: Every time a catalog import terminates

step8.title: Step 8 - Options
step8.subtitle: Options to let your prices be more attractive. Note: The options are applied BEFORE the stop condition analysis

adjustPrice.title: Adjust "New Price"
adjustPrice.example: Example: If the repricing rule calculates the new price as € {calculated}, Pricefy will reprice the sale price at € {adjusted}

roundingPrice.title: End repriced product prices
roundingPrice.example: Example: If the repricing rule sets the new price at € {calculated}, Pricefy will list the price as € {rounded} on your platform

step9.title: Step 9 - Export Settings
step9.subtitle: Configure how you want to receive your repricing results
step9.autopilotRequired: Export only works when Autopilot is enabled (Step 7)
step9.premiumRequired: Upgrade to premium to unlock export functionality

validation.competitorsRequired: At least one competitor must be selected
validation.productsRequired: At least one product must be selected

manage.error: Failed to save repricing rule. Please try again.
